<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A unified string table for these options. Individual strings are stored as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// null terminated C-strings at offsets within this table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtable">StringTable</a> &#42;StrTable;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A table of different sets of prefixes. Each set starts with the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefixes in that set followed by that many offsets into the string table</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find the OptTable option that most closely matches the given string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param &#91;in&#93; Option - A string, such as &quot;-stdlibs=l&quot;, that represents user</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// input of an option that may not exist in the OptTable. Note that the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                              visibility flags set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param &#91;in&#93; MinimumLength - Don&#39;t find options shorter than this length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, a minimum length of 3 prevents &quot;-x&quot; from being considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// near to &quot;-S&quot;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Parse an list of arguments into an InputArgList.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The resulting InputArgList will reference the strings in &#91;\\p ArgBegin,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p ArgEnd), and their lifetime should extend past that of the returned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// InputArgList.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The only error that can occur in this routine is if an argument is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// missing values; in this case \\p MissingArgCount will be non-zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param MissingArgIndex - On error, the index of the option which could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not be parsed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param MissingArgCount - On error, the number of missing options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param VisibilityMask - Only include options with any of these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// visibility flags set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return An InputArgList; on error this will contain all the options</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// which could be parsed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable/#aae1e1c17454fb6433f039b5fb02c5c4d">ParseArgs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;const char &#42;&gt;</a> Args, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MissingArgIndex,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MissingArgCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/visibility">Visibility</a> VisibilityMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/visibility">Visibility</a>()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A convenience helper which handles optional initial options populated from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an environment variable, expands response files recursively and parses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ErrorFn - Called on a formatted error message for missing arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// or unknown options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return An InputArgList; on error this will contain all the options which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// could be parsed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable/#a0f0446fb27e6a1ab9f59c283d0960e86">parseArgs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Argc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Argv, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/optspecifier">OptSpecifier</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0ba893e7dc00f439ef557e79f12e899fa88183b946cc5f0e8c96b2e66e1c74a7e">Unknown</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringsaver">StringSaver</a> &amp;Saver,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>)&gt; ErrorFn) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Render the help text for an option table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param OS - The stream to write the help text to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Usage - USAGE: Usage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Title - OVERVIEW: Title</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param VisibilityMask - Only in                 Visibility VisibilityMask,clude options with any of these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                         visibility flags set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ShowHidden     - If true, display options marked as HelpHidden</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param ShowAllAliases - If true, display all options including aliases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                         that don&#39;t have help texts. By default, we display</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                         only options that are not hidden and have help</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                         texts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable/#a1ef4e8b65e20fbddebc0a43c5b61eeb4">printHelp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Usage, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Title,</span></CodeLine>
